message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. Would you like to make an offer on it?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $100.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I was thinking it's worth a bit more than $100. How about we meet in the middle at $110?
I appreciate your flexibility, but I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm really interested in the product, but I have a budget to stick to.
I understand you're trying to stick to your budget, but I think the product is worth a bit more than $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway between $105 and $110, so how about $107.50?
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit hesitant to go above $105. How about we try $106?
I think we're getting close, but I'm still not quite comfortable with $106. How about we try $108?
I'm still not convinced that $108 is the best price for the product. I'm willing to make a serious offer of $105. If you're willing to meet me there, I'd be happy to make a deal.
I appreciate your seriousness about the offer, but I'm still not willing to go below $109. I think it's a fair price considering the product's value. Is $109 a price you'd be willing to pay?
I'm really interested in the product, but I'm not willing to go above $107. If you're willing to meet me at this price, I'll make a deal.
